channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: To Interact With the Real World, AI Will Gain Physical Intelligence
item.description: By grappling with the messy and unpredictable side of existence, machine learning can have impact beyond the digital.

item.title: Kirin offers a taste of its electric salt spoon at CES 2025

item.title: OpenAI is losing money on its pricey ChatGPT Pro plan, CEO Sam Altman says
item.description: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman on Sunday said that the company is currently losing money on its $200-per-month ChatGPT Pro plan because people are using it mor...

item.title: The 10 Coolest Things We've Seen So Far at CES 2025
item.description: Tech's big show isn't fully underway yet, but the odd and wonderful gadgets are already here. These are the coolest things we saw at the event preview...

item.title: Samsung brings live translate to its TVs at CES 2025
item.description: At CES 2025, Samsung announced that it’s bringing a popular feature from the company’s phones and tablets to its TVs. Live Translate does what it says...

item.title: Elvie unveils an app-controlled smart bouncer that transforms into a bassinet at CES 2025

item.title: 15 Best Wireless Earbuds, Tested and Reviewed (2025)
item.description: Ready to cut the cord? These are our favorite buds that will never, ever get tangled.

item.title: Samsung’s new TVs can find recipes for dishes in shows

item.title: Best iPad to Buy (and Some to Avoid) in 2025
item.description: We break down the current iPad lineup to help you figure out which one of Apple’s tablets is best for you.

item.title: HTML Is Actually a Programming Language. Fight Me
item.description: In fact, HTML is the most significant computing language ever developed. Underestimate it at your peril.
